name: Poles Apart (Ana Letícia)
description:
A side scroller platformer that you play as your mirrored version in a distorted world to solve puzzles

How To Play: 

A - Right

D - Left

Space - Jump

Step on the button with a beam of light to unlock the door
Credits: 

Ana Leticia - Programmer
Felipe Galery - Game Designer
Leonardo Bonna de Castro- Composer
